text: Gordon Williams (born 22 February 1929, died 2002https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QVZJ-451Y) was an English footballer who played as a centre forward in the Football League for Sheffield United and Darlington. He made five league appearances for each club and scored once, for Darlington, on 4 November 1950 in a 3–2 home win against Scunthorpe United in the Third Division North. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Newcastle upon Tyne Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Gordon Williams (footballer)
